price: حقيقي پاچايي په هغه ورځ يوازې رحمن لره ده او هغه پر كافرانو يوه سخته ورځ ده.
arabic: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ وَكَانَ يَوۡمًا عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: al-mul'ku yawma-idhin al-ḥaqu lilrraḥmāni wakāna yawman ʿalā al-kāfirīna ʿasīran
